data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Barcelona have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In the minute 6, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a throw-in for Barcelona, close to Villarreal's area.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Throw-in Barcelona.
In the minute 10, Throw-in high up the field for Barcelona in Barcelona.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal.
Goal! Barcelona have got their heads in front thanks to a Ansu Fati strike.
In the minute 15, That's a fine assist from Jordi Alba.
Barcelona's Sergi Roberto misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Villarreal at Camp Nou.
In the minute 19, Goal! Barcelona extend their lead to 2-0 through Ansu Fati.
Great play from Philippe Coutinho to set up the goal.
Barcelona needs to be cautious. Villarreal have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 25, Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 31, Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a Barcelona throw-in in Villarreal's half.
Barcelona to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
In the minute 34, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Barcelona.
Barcelona have extended their lead to 3-0 courtesy of a Lionel Messi penalty.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
In the minute 38, Can Villarreal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Barcelona's half?
Villarreal are caught offside.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
In the minute 40, Philippe Coutinho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Barcelona.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 42, Villarreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Barcelona.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Pau Torres has the misfortune to make it 4-0 through an own goal.
The second-half is underway in Barcelona.
In the minute 46, Manu Trigueros is on a sub for Francis Coquelin for Villarreal.
Villarreal make their second substitution with Vicente Iborra replacing Paco Alcacer.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
At Camp Nou, Villarreal are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Villarreal close to the penalty box.
In the minute 56, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Vicente Iborra (Villarreal) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 58, Barcelona have a goal kick.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Barcelona.
In the minute 60, Villarreal drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Villarreal advance rapidly upfield but Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez blows for offside.
In the minute 63, Gerard Moreno for Villarreal drives towards goal at Camp Nou. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Barcelona pushes forward through Lionel Messi, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 66, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 70, Ronald Koeman is making the team's second substitution at Camp Nou with Ousmane Dembele replacing Ansu Fati.
Pedri is replacing Philippe Coutinho for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelona.
In the minute 72, Lionel Messi (Barcelona) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
The away team have replaced Samuel Chukwueze with Takefusa Kubo. This is the third substitution made today by Unai Emery.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
In the minute 77, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team replace Antoine Griezmann with Trincao.
In the minute 78, Miralem Pjanic is replacing Sergio Busquets for the home team.
Villarreal are pushing forward but Mario Gaspar's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
In the minute 83, Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gerard Moreno (Villarreal) gets a yellow card.
Unai Emery (Villarreal) is making a fourth substitution, with Ramiro Funes Mori replacing Raul Albiol.
In the minute 84, Villarreal make their fifth substitution with Carlos Bacca replacing Gerard Moreno.
In Barcelona Barcelona drive forward through Lionel Messi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Barcelona's Lionel Messi gets in a shot on goal at Camp Nou. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Barcelona drive forward but Trincao is judged offside.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Barcelona are coming forward and Lionel Messi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Barcelona have a dangerous throw-in.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Barcelona.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Full-time! The final score is 4-0.
